name: part_010
file: tmp_【３D】ライブも企画も！誕生日祭だーー！！！！【 #大神ミオ誕生日 】 [ChMwx4yeI3g]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Ookami Mio and Tokoyami Towa perform the song "BLUE CLAPPER".
MC segment between Ookami Mio and Tokoyami Towa after the song.
Sakura Miko arrives with a birthday cake.

subtitles.original: Hey maybe 今この瞬間に何があるの？
subtitles.english: Hey maybe, what is there in this moment?

subtitles.original: 待ったはないの提灯　追いつくまでshaking
subtitles.english: There's no waiting, keep shaking until I catch up

subtitles.original: でもたまに止まってthinking thinking
subtitles.english: But sometimes I stop to keep on thinking, thinking

subtitles.original: 変えてみせるぜ運気　踏み出すのは3step
subtitles.english: I'll change my luck, starting with these three steps

subtitles.original: 掴んでみせるよ　キラキラMy dream
subtitles.english: I'll grasp it, my sparkling dream

subtitles.original: 叶う日までStory
subtitles.english: Until the day it comes true, this is my story

subtitles.original: 繋ぐから　だって君に
subtitles.english: I'll connect it, because I want you...

subtitles.original: ずっと見てほしいから
subtitles.english: ...to keep watching me forever

subtitles.original: 手を挙げてClap your hands 海の向こうまで
subtitles.english: Raise your hands and clap, to the other side of the sea

subtitles.original: Clap your hands 届きますように
subtitles.english: Clap your hands, so it reaches you

subtitles.original: 手を叩こう　手を叩こう
subtitles.english: Let's clap our hands, let's clap our hands

subtitles.original: ほら一緒に
subtitles.english: Come on, join in

subtitles.original: Everybody Clap your hands 空の向こうまで
subtitles.english: Everybody clap your hands, to the other side of the sky

subtitles.original: Clap your hands 響きますように
subtitles.english: Clap your hands, so it resonates

subtitles.original: 手を叩こう　手を叩こう
subtitles.english: Let's clap our hands, let's clap our hands

subtitles.original: 光射す　僕たちの未来
subtitles.english: The light shines on our future

subtitles.original: 昼間いらないbreak it 理性は早めにbreak it
subtitles.english: No need for the day, break it; break your reason early

subtitles.original: 何時でも良いでしょう？ 24/7
subtitles.english: Any time is fine, right? 24/7

subtitles.original: 君は何をfeel it？ 解き放てsparking
subtitles.english: What are you feeling? Let it all out sparking

subtitles.original: 暗闇に放つレーザービーム
subtitles.english: A laser beam firing into the darkness

subtitles.original: 光らせてステージ
subtitles.english: Light up the stage

subtitles.original: 作るから　だって君に
subtitles.english: I'll create it, because I want you...

subtitles.original: もっと見てほしいから
subtitles.english: ...to watch me even more

subtitles.original: 手を挙げてClap your hands 海の向こうまで
subtitles.english: Raise your hands and clap, to the other side of the sea

subtitles.original: Clap your hands 届きますように
subtitles.english: Clap your hands, so it reaches you

subtitles.original: 手を叩こう　手を叩こう
subtitles.english: Let's clap our hands, let's clap our hands

subtitles.original: ほら一緒に
subtitles.english: Come on, join in

subtitles.original: Everybody Clap your hands 空の向こうまで
subtitles.english: Everybody clap your hands, to the other side of the sky

subtitles.original: Clap your hands 響きますように
subtitles.english: Clap your hands, so it resonates

subtitles.original: 手を叩こう　手を叩こう
subtitles.english: Let's clap our hands, let's clap our hands

subtitles.original: 重なるwave 世界を揺らせ
subtitles.english: Overlapping waves, let them shake the world

subtitles.original: 終わりあることすら　既にI know
subtitles.english: I already know that everything has an end

subtitles.original: でもまだまだ泳ぎ足りないの
subtitles.english: But I still haven't had enough of swimming through it

subtitles.original: Boom Give me crazy
subtitles.english: Boom, give me crazy

subtitles.original: Boom 窓はracy
subtitles.english: Boom, the window is racy

subtitles.original: Boom 次元勝り合う 全て塗り替えるよ
subtitles.english: Boom, outdoing the dimensions, I'll repaint it all

subtitles.original: 手を挙げてClap your hands 海の向こうまで
subtitles.english: Raise your hands and clap, to the other side of the sea

subtitles.original: Clap your hands 届きますように
subtitles.english: Clap your hands, so it reaches you

subtitles.original: 手を叩こう　手を叩こう
subtitles.english: Let's clap our hands, let's clap our hands

subtitles.original: ほら一緒に
subtitles.english: Come on, join in

subtitles.original: Everybody Clap your hands 空の向こうまで
subtitles.english: Everybody clap your hands, to the other side of the sky

subtitles.original: Clap your hands 響きますように
subtitles.english: Clap your hands, so it resonates

subtitles.original: 手を叩こう　手を叩こう
subtitles.english: Let's clap our hands, let's clap our hands

subtitles.original: 光射す　僕たちの未来
subtitles.english: The light shines on our future

subtitles.original: はぁー！
subtitles.english: Phew!

subtitles.original: はぁ、激しい...
subtitles.english: Wow, that was intense...

subtitles.original: BLUE CLAPPERでした！
subtitles.english: That was BLUE CLAPPER!

subtitles.original: でした！
subtitles.english: It was!

subtitles.original: あぁ、ありがとう！いや、すごい楽しかった！
subtitles.english: Ah, thank you! Man, that was so much fun!

subtitles.original: 楽しかった！
subtitles.english: It was fun!

subtitles.original: 疲れたんじゃないかい？
subtitles.english: You must be tired, right?

subtitles.original: いやー、でも楽しかった。
subtitles.english: Yeah, but it was fun.

subtitles.original: お休み中なのに、ごめんね、来てもらって。
subtitles.english: Sorry for having you come over even though you're on break.

subtitles.original: いや全然！もう、ミオちゃんが呼ぶならもう行きますよ！
subtitles.english: No, not at all! If Mio-chan calls, I'll be there!

subtitles.original: 羽を広げ、ミオちゃんのもとへ。
subtitles.english: Spreading my wings... to Mio-chan's side.

subtitles.original: なるほどね、羽を広げ。
subtitles.english: I see, spreading your wings.

subtitles.original: そうそうそう。
subtitles.english: Right, right.

subtitles.original: あ、てかそういえばさ、なんでミオちゃんさ、事務所にいたの？
subtitles.english: Oh, speaking of which, why were you at the office, Mio-chan?

subtitles.original: あぁ、そうだ。ケーキ食べようと思ってたんだけど...
subtitles.english: Oh, that's right. I was planning to eat cake, but...

subtitles.original: あぁ、ケーキね！あ！ハッピーバースデー、ミオちゃん！
subtitles.english: Ah, cake! Oh! Happy Birthday, Mio-chan!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you! Thank you!

subtitles.original: I love you!
subtitles.english: I love you!

subtitles.original: そう、そうなんだけど...アイラブユー。
subtitles.english: Yeah, that's right... I love you too.

subtitles.original: アイラブユー！
subtitles.english: I love you!

subtitles.original: そう、そうなんだけどさぁ、なんか、ケーキなくて。
subtitles.english: Yeah, but the thing is, there's no cake.

subtitles.original: あぁ、なんかどっかでケーキ見なかった？
subtitles.english: Oh, didn't you see a cake somewhere?

subtitles.original: あ、ケーキ？え、結構大きかった？
subtitles.english: Oh, cake? Um, was it quite big?

subtitles.original: あ、そう！大きいケーキ！見た？
subtitles.english: Ah, yes! A big cake! Did you see it?

subtitles.original: 見たかもしれない！
subtitles.english: I might have seen it!

subtitles.original: え、本当！？
subtitles.english: Really!?

subtitles.original: え、ちょっと行こうか？探しに。ちょっと行ってくるわ！
subtitles.english: Well, shall we go look for it? I'll go check!

subtitles.original: え、トワ様！？おー、わかった！行ってらっしゃい！
subtitles.english: Eh, Towa-sama!? Oh, okay! Take care!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！え、なんか、え、教えて、どこにあったか！
subtitles.english: Thank you! Wait, um, tell me where it was!

subtitles.original: いなくなっちゃった。
subtitles.english: She's gone.

subtitles.original: え、ケーキあったみたいですね。っていうことは、うちはもうちょっとでケーキが食べれるってこと？
subtitles.english: Oh, it seems there was a cake. Does that mean I'll be able to eat cake soon?

subtitles.original: わかんないけど。え？何？何？この声は？この舌足らずな声は？
subtitles.english: I'm not sure, but... Eh? What? What's that? This voice? This lisping voice?

subtitles.original: は！みこち！
subtitles.english: Ah! Mikochi!

subtitles.original: は！待ってた、それはケーキ！
subtitles.english: Wait, that's the cake!

subtitles.original: あ、ちょっとちょっとちょっと！ほら、なんで持ち逃げしようとしてるの？
subtitles.english: Ah, wait wait wait! Look, why are you trying to run away with it?

subtitles.original: いや、これはね、ちょっとさっき、あの、そこら辺にね、こうやって置いてあったから、みこキャッチしたんだよ。
subtitles.english: Well, you see, it was just sitting over there earlier, so Miko caught it.

subtitles.original: あ、置いてあったの？なんかひどい...
subtitles.english: Oh, it was just left there? How mean...
